    • Method Detail

      • inline

        public static String inline(String htmlContent,
                            List<ImageResource> images,
                            CssImageInlinerConstants.InlineMode mode,
                            Function<CssImageDeclaration,String> inlineHandler)
        Search for all images included by CSS properties using url() (either defined in CSS rules or style attributes).

        For each matched URL, it delegates the replacement value to inlineHandler parameter. The HTML content is updated with the new URL if the image points to a local image and the handler corresponds to the inline mode.

        The inline mode can be specified globally (default mode if none is specified), per CSS rule or per image using CssImageInlinerConstants.INLINE_MODE_PROPERTY.

        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML content that may include CSS properties that points to images that need to be inlined
        images - the images to inline
        mode - the inline mode
        inlineHandler - the handler that provides the URL replacement
        Returns:
        the updated HTML

      • removeOghamProperties

        public static String removeOghamProperties(String html)
        Remove properties that are used only by Ogham:
        • CssImageInlinerConstants.INLINE_MODE_PROPERTY
        • CssImageInlinerConstants.INLINED_URL_FUNC
        Parameters:
        html - the html to clean
        Returns:
        the cleaned html
